title: Tailwind is GREAT!
content: Tailwind helped me style this project in no time flat!

title: Tailwind makes styling easy by applying classes directly to HTML elements!
content: Writing out a bunch of CSS can be a long process. With Tailwind classes can be applied directly to HTML tags with abbreviated notations

title: Tailwind makes styling faster and more fun
content: With Tailwind, seeing your page change is easier so styling becomes a lot more fun, and less cumbersome
